New Records: Spencer Torkelson scored on a wild pitch in the eighth inning.
Key Match Events: Andy Ibáñez hit a tiebreaking three-run double in the eighth inning.
Kerry Carpenter sparked the Tigers' rally with a one-out single off Ryan Pressly.
Colt Keith reached on a two-out walk, and closer Josh Hader walked Spencer Torkelson to load the bases.
Pre-Game Insights: The Tigers' manager A.J. Hinch, who led the Astros to a championship in 2017, was fired in the aftermath of the Astros' sign-stealing scandal.
Post-Match Reflections: Tigers manager A.J. Hinch expressed pride in the team's resilience after the comeback win.
The victory was a pivotal moment in the Tigers' playoff push.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers swept the series, marking the fourth sweep in postseason history for the team.
The Astros' seven straight postseason losses at home included four World Series appearances and two titles.
Others: The Tigers advanced to the AL Division Series to face the AL Central champions in a best-of-five series.
